articles.title: Pixel 8 Pro hands-on leak outs major hardware information of Google's imminent flagship phone - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Ahead of its scheduled debut tomorrow, the Google Pixel 8 Pro has now leaked rather comprehensively, with hands-on images of the phone running the AIDA64 and Device Info HW apps revealing some of its major hardware details.
articles.content: Both the Google Pixel 8 Pro and the Pixel 8 have leaked comprehensively over the past few weeks. The premium devices are scheduled to debut tomorrow alongside the next-gen Pixel Watch, but a new hand… [+849 chars]

Apple has warned that a bug in the iOS 17 software powering its latest iPhone 15 Pro model is causing smartphones to overheat.
